name: Christmas Monster Angel
description:
Wow! Is it a monster? Is it an angel? Wow! is a little bit of both. 

This little monster is dressed up for christmas, all angelic in silver and white, with a pair of removable felt wings. The wings are attached with a small circle of velcro, double stitched through the merino onto a piece of felt, so very safe for young ones.

‘Wow!’ is a very excited soft toy who just wants to celebrate this Christmas with you.

Knitted from 100% NZ merino with hand embroidered detailing, this creature stands 19cm (7.5 inches) tall, and with no loose pieces, is safe enough for soft toy lovers of any age.

** I have one in stock but more on the way! **

Merino is fully washable – great for kids!
Machine washable in cool water on wool cycle only. Dry flat.

Not only for children, these deliciously adorable monsters are hand-knitted and hand embroidered, making each one unique. They are taken from a series of drawings from my preschool children, and lovingly knitted by me.

name: I Miss You - Merino Monster in Mustard
description:
Aww, what a sad little toy. This hand-knitted, hand-embroidered creature is a little teary, and really wants a cuddle. 

Knitted from 100% NZ merino with hand embroidered detailing, this creature stands 20cm (8 inches) tall, and with no loose pieces, is safe enough for soft toy lovers of any age.

Also available in pale blue, magenta, charcoal, mustard or teal merino. Leg colour is picked at random, so actual may differ slightly to what is pictured, but if you would like the exact colours just let me know!

Merino is fully washable - great for kids!
Machine washable in cool water on wool cycle only. Dry flat. 

Not only for children, these deliciously adorable monsters are hand-knitted and hand embroidered, making each one unique. They are taken from a series of drawings from my preschool children, and lovingly knitted by me. Keep a look out for the rest of the range.

name: Give us a Hug - Merino Monster in Pale Grey
description:
Need to give a cuddle to a loved one, or just want to buy a gorgeous soft toy for that special child in your life? 'Give Us A Hug' is a special soft toy who just wants to cuddle.

Knitted from 100% pure NZ Merino with hand embroidered detailing, this creature stands 31cm (13 inches) tall, and with no loose pieces, is safe enough for soft toy lovers of any age. 

Also available in teal, mustard, charcoal, magenta or pale blue merino. Leg colour is picked at random, so actual may differ slightly to what is pictured, but if you would like the exact colours just let me know!

Merino is fully washable - great for kids!
Machine washable in cool water on wool cycle only. Dry flat.

Not only for children, these deliciously adorable monsters are hand-knitted and hand embroidered, making each one unique. They are taken from a series of drawings from my preschool children, and lovingly knitted by me. Keep a look out for the rest of the range.

description:

Also available in teal merino.
